Background:

I’m Chris Thomas --a graduating senior from the University of Pennsylvania: Wharton School. I studied Entrepreneurship and Innovation, and I am passionate about harvesting the power of technology to transform industries. Currently, I am pursuing software development at TechStars Boston Startup School—based in the Harvard iLab. I am eager to pursue opportunities that combine knowledge of both software and business.

Previously, I have been responsible for leading business development, marketing and fundraising initiatives for various startups including the Google, NASA-sponsored UPenn Robotics Consortium. I have also worked honed analytical skills through my time at companies like Goldman Sachs.

When I am not pursuing Internet and consumer innovation, you can find me at a Brazilian Samba or mixing sauce at Samba Sauce.
